title: Department of Energy
description: Pioneering advancements in long-duration energy storage, this U.S. government agency focuses on reducing grid-scale storage costs by 90% within the decade while enhancing energy security and promoting technological breakthroughs.

children.value: Pioneering advancements in long-duration energy storage, this U.S. government agency focuses on reducing grid-scale storage costs by 90% within the decade while enhancing energy security and promoting technological breakthroughs.
